metadata.title: CVE-2013-4290 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in OpenJPEG before 1.5.2 allows remoteattackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors to (1)lib/openjp3d/opj_jp3d_compress.c, (2) bin/jp3d/convert.c, or (3)lib/openjp3d/event.c.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
